totalIncomeGrowth: Total income increased from 231839 crore in Dec 2023 to 248079 crore in Dec 2024, showing a positive growth.

netProfitGrowth: Net profit increased from 19488 crore in Dec 2023 to 21804 crore in Dec 2024, showcasing a positive growth.

Sequential growth in EPS from Sep 2024 to Dec 2024 shows a positive trend.
segmentPerformance: The Oil to Chemicals segment demonstrates consistent growth in both revenue and net profit percentage across quarters.
